title: How to maintain phone and accessories?
answer:
1、Avoid phone sliding into dust or water. Don’t use phone in high humidity or dust-intensive areas. Avoid crash or avoid collision.  
2、Use original battery, original charger, don’t use phone when being charged.  
3、Don’t pull and insert SIM card and Annex too often.  
4、Don’t place phone with sharp object, to avoid scratching case and screen.
